title: International Epidemiology Workshop
text: The next IEW will be held in Brazil from April 8-13 2024 in Foz do Iguaçu, Brazil. Check this website regularly for updates about the meeting. The International Epidemiology Workshop (IEW) is the principal working group of plant disease epidemiology. This is an organization with a rich history, and has met approximately every 5 years since 1963. The regularly published proceedings of the IEW include recognized benchmarks of epidemiology. A significant feature of this conference is that all participants meet as a unified group.

title: International Epidemiology Workshop
text:
About
The International Epidemiology Workshop (IEW) is the principal working group of plant disease epidemiology.  This is an organization with a rich history, and has met approximately every 5 years since 1963. The regularly published proceedings of the IEW include recognized benchmarks of epidemiology. A significant feature of this conference is that all participants meet as a unified group.
